post.body: Hey! When you gonna be in town for Christmas?
Argh - I miss all of the good holidays!!!
I am right there with you. I don't think I'm going to make it through the weekend. I might suffocate - asphyxiation by written word.
oh. wow.
There's a pagan agenda? How come no one told me?
I'm anxiously awaiting an update! How's the patient?
Well, that's a venti order of suck, with a double shot of suck and some whole suck, topped with whipped suck and suck shavings.
Oh nos! No fake Tori?!
because you like shoveling snow?
Well, that's kind of awesometastic. There is partying to be pursued.
Just finally changed out of my pjs. Based on how these pants fit, I'm positive that my 1 wk paper writing spree has gained me 10 lbs
Has 20 terrible mangled pages. These pages are so mangled and shallow that revision should yield that 10 that are missing.
Banshee just asked me why I'm still awake. Don't worry, she was speaking Kitten. I'm not hallucinating that badly yet.
19 till pages till 'splode.
5 is not 7.5
must. write.
has a draft. One. Needs two more. For now, she will sleep.
I just wrote the most mangled sentence ever. It brings this cold heart some joy.
And I continue to stare at this abstract and wonder if it's just right...
confession: sometimes I go buy fast-food just to get myself out of the house.
I am enjoying some gingerbread coffee with mint sandwich cookies - all courtesy of Trader Joe's. Perfect reading accompaniment.
Metaphor: my passenger window has slipped off its track.
Drinking chocolate just might save paper #3!
Has just completed paper #2. Now, to continue proofing paper #3 (which is admittedly, abysmal).
